mapper.sql: id, cha1, cha2, cha3, cha4, cha5, cha6, cha7
mapper.update: update user1.types_char set cha1 = #{cha1,jdbcType=CHAR}, cha2 = #{cha2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cha3 = #{cha3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cha4 = #{cha4,jdbcType=NCHAR}, cha5 = #{cha5,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, cha6 = #{cha6,jdbcType=CLOB}, cha7 = #{cha7,jdbcType=NCLOB} where id = #{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
